title: FS: T206 HOFer's including Johnson Portrait, Matty White Cap  All Sold, Thanks.
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOFer's including Johnson Portrait, Matty White Cap  All Sold, Thanks.
posts.post_content:
Selling my T206 Hall of Famers. I accept PayPal friends and family or regular.  Price is net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Shipping is on me for orders over $100, otherwise please add $3.00 for shipping.  Better scans are available on request, just e-mail or PM me.

Chief Bender No Trees in Background, OM, SGC 30- $100
Jimmy Collins Portrait, PD350, Ungraded- $40
Crawford, Throwing, PD350, Ungraded- $55
Evers, Cubs on Shirt, PD150, SGC 20- $95
Evers, Chicago on Shirt, PD460, PSA 2- $115
Griffith Portrait, PD150, PSA 2- $75
Johnson Portrait, PD150, SGC 10- $300
Mathewson, White Cap, PD150, Ungraded this card was soaked for a little bit, it did not help loosen the glue on the back- $150
Tinker, Bat on Shoulder, Partial Double Name (same name), PD460, Ungraded- $65
Walsh Portrait, PD150, Ungraded- $85
   
  Willing to negotiate on an offer for the lot, or a combination of cards.  It never hurts to ask, so feel free.  PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing negotiations. Thanks for looking.

PM sent for the lot. Thanks Zach


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
